channel.title: fseventer Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.7.6
item.description:
(Same as 2.7.5 but now supports older G3/G4 machines). Security changes so as to follow Apple's recommendations for privileged helper tools. Support for 10.6 Snow Leopard.
v2.6.6: Path and process filters can be exclude or include. Can filter out invisible (DOT<name>) files. Can filter processes based on which application is frontmost
v2.6.5: Missing events bug fix (some events were quietly being ignored). Cosmetic improvements - crisper icons in table, core animation in filter. Help now comments on Apple's fseventd (which has nothing to do with this app), and uninstalling.
v2.6: Filtering: Advanced filters (event, process, path, etc) can be applied to all views. Unified functionality into toolbar, with some nicer icons. Extra preference added to revert to old style of tree.
v2.5: Interface redux: Improved layout and clarity of tree. Fixed incomplete printing bug and other various minor bugs.
info
